name: EZ AI
description:
EZ AI

Help the blind robot navigate pass dangerous obstacles in this simple endless runner! Jump between buildings, avoid roof access rooms and steer clear of electric fences.

How to Play

Choose from the 3 items available at the bottom of the screen and place them on the path of the blind robot to help it dodge dangerous elements. The 3 items available are:

> Jumppad; Pushes the blind robot up into a short jump
> Cannon; Blasts the blind robot up into the sky
> Hoverboard; Acts as a bridge
